title: Real Estate Cold Caller-Only Want Experienced
job_overview:
Job Title: Experienced Real Estate Cold Caller (Remote, U.S. Hours)
Company: Blue Crab Home Buyers Job Type: 
Part-Time to Full-Time | Remote Compensation: $4/hour + minimum $250 commission per closed deal

Job Description:

Blue Crab Home Buyers is actively hiring an experienced and driven Real Estate Cold Caller to join our acquisitions team. This remote, full-time role requires availability during standard U.S. business hours. The ideal candidate must have at least 3 years of proven experience in real estate wholesaling and consistently generate 2–3 qualified leads daily, using Calltools and tracking work hours via Clockify.

Key Responsibilities:

Conduct outbound cold calls to property owners using Calltools and provided scripts.

Identify and pre-qualify motivated seller leads.

Evaluate property values and pull accurate comps.

Consistently achieve or exceed daily and weekly performance metrics (calls and leads).

Track daily tasks and work hours accurately using Clockify.

Requirements:

Minimum 3 years of real estate wholesaling experience (mandatory).

Comprehensive knowledge of the wholesaling process: comping, skip tracing, and making offers.

Proven record of generating 2–3 qualified leads per day.

Fluent English with excellent verbal communication skills.

Highly motivated, results-oriented, and self-driven.

Ability to work independently in a quiet, remote environment with reliable internet.

What We Provide:

Competitive base pay ($4/hour) with a minimum $250 commission per closed deal.

All essential tools and software, including Calltools and Clockify.

Access to scripts, CRM systems, and targeted lead lists.

Opportunities for long-term growth and consistent deal flow.

How to Apply:

Please email the following items to Upgrade to see actual info

Updated resume

A brief (1–2 minute) voice recording introducing yourself and detailing your cold calling/wholesaling experience

Summary of your real estate lead generation achievements

Note: This role is strictly for experienced candidates; no training will be provided. Only serious applicants with documented results will be considered.
